parameters.query: SELECT fp.profile_id, fp.account_id, fp.fingerprint_data, fp.last_used_at, fp.usage_count FROM fingerprint_profiles fp WHERE fp.account_id = $1 AND fp.is_active = TRUE ORDER BY fp.last_used_at DESC LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO fingerprint_profiles (account_id, channel_id, fingerprint_data, device_type, target_platform, usage_count, is_active, created_at, last_used_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3::jsonb, $4, $5, 1, TRUE, NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (account_id, device_type, target_platform) DO UPDATE SET fingerprint_data = $3::jsonb, usage_count = fingerprint_profiles.usage_count + 1, last_used_at = NOW() RETURNING profile_id
